author: Salti
content: Bullish: There is something to be said about holding long on a great company like nvda. One kid has aapl shares cost is 46$ something. Just left it through bear markets, covid, splits. Hate to sell one share, tax is i think around 80% .

author: Bobby Bittman
content: HSBC analysts have raised Nvidia's price target to $200 per share, up from $145 previously. The firm cited the stock's upside potential due to AI-driven growth and increased data center performance as the reasons behind the price target increase.

author: Lazerator
content: We know that growth is slowing, and that the competition is nipping at NVDA's heels.  The question is what that will do to the stock price.  The lemmings will continue to buy no mater what the valuation says.
